reviewText: I bought this for my husband as a random gift and he absolutely loved it. It was shipped in a timely manner and was packaged very well. It was totally worth it!
Bought this for the hubby and he loved it!
This movie came quickly and undamaged! I was excited to watch and gained a better understanding for RV and how he races. Must be for ALL motocross/supercross fans. Good for all ages!

I was really hoping to get a better view into the life of Villopoto, not his career.  I've been watching RV race every weekend since he showed up in the AMA.  I felt like the interviews were surface deep and too short.  The riding sections were a bit drawn out and got a little boring.

I hate not giving this 5 stars, because RV is one of my favorite riders.  I just felt a little let down when it was finished.  For a very good documentary, check out CBS's Ryan Villopoto Champion.
This item was just as it was described. Fast shipping also! The movie was awesome to watch cause im a huge fan of ryan villopoto.
Great gift for my son.  He loved it.
